statements: SELECT * FROM invasive_species_movement_data;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM invasive_species_movement_data;
SELECT species_id, species_name, timestamp FROM invasive_species_movement_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM invasive_species_movement_data WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM invasive_species_movement_data WHERE species_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT * FROM invasive_species_movement_data WHERE species_name = 'Snake' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM invasive_species_movement_data WHERE latitude < 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM invasive_species_movement_data WHERE longitude BETWEEN -90 AND -80 ORDER BY species_id
SELECT * FROM invasive_species_movement_data WHERE species_name = 'Rat' OR species_name = 'Frog' ORDER BY species_id DESC
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM invasive_species_movement_data GROUP BY species_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT * FROM movement_data WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
SELECT species_name, movement_type FROM movement_data WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT species_id, location_name, movement_date FROM movement_data LEFT JOIN location_data ON movement_data.location_id = location_data.location_id;
SELECT species_name, location_name, movement_type FROM movement_data JOIN location_data ON movement_data.location_id = location_data.location_id WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM movement_data ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM movement_data WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, movement_type, movement_date FROM movement_data WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, location_name FROM movement_data JOIN location_data ON movement_data.location_id = location_data.location_id;
SELECT * FROM movement_data WHERE movement_type = 'migration' AND movement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT species_name AS Name, COUNT(species_id) AS Count FROM movement_data GROUP BY species_name HAVING Count > 1 ORDER BY Count DESC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_id, species_name, species_category FROM species WHERE species_category = 'Mammal';
SELECT * FROM species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, location_id FROM movement_data WHERE movement_type = 'Migration';
SELECT * FROM species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM species WHERE species_category = 'Mammal';

SELECT movement_id, species_name, location_name, movement_date FROM movement_data INNER JOIN species ON movement_data.species_id = species.species_id INNER JOIN locations ON movement_data.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE movement_type = 'Migration' ORDER BY movement_date ASC;
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) AS species_count FROM species GROUP BY species_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT locations.location_name, COUNT(*) AS location_count FROM locations INNER JOIN movement_data ON locations.location_id = movement_data.location_id GROUP BY locations.location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM species ORDER BY species_type;
SELECT * FROM tracking_data WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT data_id, movement_type, distance FROM movements WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT observation_id, observer_name, observation_desc FROM observation ORDER BY observation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT observation_id, observer_name, observation_desc FROM observation ORDER BY observation_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_type, location, date_time FROM species JOIN tracking_data ON species.species_id = tracking_data.species_id WHERE date_time >= '2023-01-01';

SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) AS total_movements FROM species JOIN tracking_data ON species.species_id = tracking_data.species_id JOIN movements ON tracking_data.data_id = movements.data_id GROUP BY species_name ORDER BY total_movements DESC;
SELECT * FROM movement_data;
SELECT species_name, movement_type FROM movement_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species_info WHERE invasive_status = TRUE;
SELECT species_id_1, species_id_2, interaction_type FROM species_interaction ORDER BY interaction_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM movement_data WHERE species_name = 'Lion' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT species_name, movement_type, location_id FROM movement_data WHERE location_id = 2 AND date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT movement_type, COUNT(*) AS movement_count FROM movement_data GROUP BY movement_type HAVING movement_count > 10 ORDER BY movement_count DESC;

SELECT s.species_name, m.movement_type, l.location_name FROM species_info s INNER JOIN species_movement m ON s.species_id = m.species_id INNER JOIN location_data l ON m.location_id = l.location_id WHERE s.invasive_status = TRUE ORDER BY l.latitude ASC, l.longitude DESC;

SELECT s1.species_name AS species_1, s2.species_name AS species_2, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_description FROM species_interaction i INNER JOIN species_info s1 ON i.species_id_1 = s1.species_id INNER JOIN species_info s2 ON i.species_id_2 = s2.species_id ORDER BY i.interaction_type ASC;
